channel.title: Shell on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Shell on Notes

item.description: August 1, 2018 Chmod # Default permission: chmod 755 # DIR -rwxr-xr-x chmod 644 # FILE -rw-r--r-- Change all directories to 755: find . -type d -exec chmod 755 {} \; Change all files to 644 under current directory: find . -type f -exec chmod 644 {} \; Rename Multiple # for i in *.js; do mv "$i" "./${i/pattern/replace}"; done Example: Rename list of files from: ic-one.svg -> one.
December 12, 2020 WiFi # Turn off IPv6 on Mac OS: networksetup -setv6off Wi-Fi

item.title: Postgres
item.description: December 12, 2018 Connect # psql -hlocalhost -Uusername -W -ddatabasename Dump # pg_dump -hlocalhost -Upostgres dbname > ~/dump.sql
